meanings.definition: A surface on a stove used for cooking food.
meanings.sent1: The cooktop on the stove was hot.
meanings.sent2: She placed the pot on the cooktop to boil water.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to walk on the cooktop, thinking it was a warm bed.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a cooktop, heating up new ideas in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The shiny cooktop gleamed under the kitchen lights.

meanings.definition: To cook food on a cooktop.
meanings.sent1: He likes to cook breakfast on the cooktop every morning.
meanings.sent2: They decided to cook dinner on the cooktop instead of the oven.
meanings.sent3: She playfully challenged her friend to a cook-off on the cooktop.
meanings.sent4: His passion for cooking on the cooktop ignited a culinary career.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of spices filled the kitchen as she cooked on the cooktop.
